org.iotivity.service.resourcecontainer

Class RcsResourceContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.iotivity.service.resourcecontainer.RcsResourceContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RcsResourceContainerBundleAPI

    public class RcsResourceContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements RcsResourceContainerBundleAPI
    This class provides APIs for managing the container and bundles in the container.

      • startContainer

        public java.util.List<RcsBundleInfo> startContainer(java.lang.String configFile)
        API for starting the Container

        This API start the container with the provided Configuration file.

        Parameters:
        configFile - configuration File that contains the Bundle/Bundles information.
        Returns:
        collection of container bundles

      • stopContainer

        API for stopping the Container

      • listBundles

        Returns:

      • addBundle

        public void addBundle(java.lang.String bundleId,
                      java.lang.String bundleUri,
                      java.lang.String bundlePath,
                      java.lang.String activator,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        API for adding the bundle to the Container
        Parameters:
        bundleId - Id of the Bundle
        bundleUri - Uri of the bundle
        bundlePath - Path of the bundle
        activator - Activation prefix for .so bundles, or activator class name for .jar bundles
        params - key-value pairs in string form for other Bundle parameters

        It is dynamic configuration
